document_data.name: ''Bracers of Archery''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bracers of archery''''', also known as '''''bracers of the perfect shot''''', were [[magic item|magical]] [[bracer]]s that empowered their wearer with a supernatural skill with [[bow]]s.
document_data.Description: Typical ''bracers of archery'' looked like normal leather protective wristbands.
document_data.Powers: A creature attuned to a set of ''bracers of archery'' became proficient with [[shortbow]]s and [[longbow]]s even without prior training. In addition, arrows shot by someone wearing ''bracers of archery'' were more penetrating and damaging than normal. This benefit only worked if both bracers were worn.
document_data.Notable ''Bracers of Archery'':
The spirit of the [[Chult]]an [[Primal spirit#The Nine Trickster Gods of Omu|trickster god]] [[Kubazan]] inhabited a set of ''bracers of archery'' that was adorned with carved images of [[froghemoth]]s. The skin of anyone wearing those bracers was kept disturbingly moist.

The ''[[Dale's Protector]]'' was a set of ''bracers'' that originated from the [[Great Dale]].
